text: Karolos Papoulias (, 4 June 1929 - 26 December 2021) was a Greek politician. He was the 6th President of Greece from 2005 to 2015. He was the Minister for Foreign Affairs from 1985 to 1989 and from 1993 to 1996. Papoulias died on 26 December 2021 in Athens at the age of 92.Former Greek President Papoulias passes away ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Eastern Orthodox Christians Category:Foreign ministers of Greece Category:Presidents of Greece
title: Karolos Papoulias
